DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect lifestyle intervention program type 2 diabetes risk factor quality life overweight Latino youth .
DOC.brief_title: Community-Based Participatory Research Improve Health Quality Life Latino Youth : Every Little Step Counts
DOC.detailed_description: With increase prevalence obesity , incidence obesity-related co-morbidities include depression type 2 diabetes emerge critical public health condition . Furthermore , Latinos experience disproportionately great burden obesity-related disorder . Therefore , develop 12-week community-based lifestyle intervention include weekly education session child parent 3 exercise session per week youth . The program deliver local YMCA great Phoenix Metropolitan area .
